Texts.Chs: 下载完毕！我现在可以制作各种不同的雏机物品，看起来设备里面好像也有一张新的蓝图，一件^orange;独特武器^white;!
Texts.Eng: The download is finished! I can now craft a variety of Trinkian items, and it looks like there's a blueprint for a new, ^orange;unique weapon ^white;in here, too!

Texts.Chs: 这本^orange;雏机工艺指南^white;的文件大小比我想象的要大得多...我需要一块^orange;回路数据设备^white;下载其全部文件。雏机商人经常出售这些物品：^green;我应该到附近看看有没有人出售这种设备^white;.
Texts.Eng: The file size for this ^orange;Trinkian Crafting Guide ^white;is substantially larger than I thought... I'll need a ^orange;Circuit Data Drive ^white;to download it all. Trinkian merchants often sell these items: ^green;I should check around the settlement for someone selling such a drive^white;.
